A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This next installment in the new Star Wars saga didn't necessarily live up to all the hype\, but I think was better than many people thought. I liked the development between Rey and Kylo's characters (although the telepathic conversations were a little bizarre). The most disappointing part was the lack of real plot development as the First Order chases the Resistance throughout all of space for the majority of the movie. Some of the dialogue and scenes dragged a little. I wasn't disappointed by what happened to Luke; I felt they explained his motivations well. Could have done without Leia floating through space though. But BB-8 is badass and the best droid\, and Porgs are super cute!
